description: This file defines a Spring Data JPA repository interface for the User entity, providing methods to find users by username or email case-insensitively.

classes.name: UserRepository
classes.description: Repository interface for performing CRUD operations and custom queries on User entities.

methods.name: findByUsernameIgnoreCase
methods.description: Searches for a User by username, ignoring case.

methods.name: findByEmailIgnoreCase
methods.description: Searches for a User by email, ignoring case.
